title: Admirer but it actually makes sense

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Propose to a player during the day. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the night, your target learns they were proposed to and may accept or deny your proposition. If they deny it, nothing happens. You learn the outcome.
- If your proposition is accepted, you and your target learn each other's roles. You lose all remaining uses of your ability, and you two may win with each other as Lovers, and if one dies the other dies as well. Note that you do not win with the other's faction, and your lover cannot win with Town if they aren't already Town.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang every criminal and evildoer, or live with your true love to the very end.
